name: Tourist Trap (Pajama Llama Games)
description:
Tourist Trap, a game where you have to lure tourists to your pizzeria through the narrow streets of Venice.
You can lure tourists by playing your music in the right rhythm, or you can scare them away by playing false notes.

Made for the 32th Ludum Dare game jam, which had as its theme "An Unconventional Weapon".

The entry which you can view here.
